name: Prism Break (itch) (Liam Croxford)
description:
Prism break: You and your co-worker wake up after an explosion sends the underground mining facility into disarray, finding that no one else survived and most of the facility is destroyed. With help of your co-worker and your high-powered mining laser break through to the surface to survive. Although not everything as it seems.

-Features-

  • Utilizeyou and your fellow miner to break through walls that only their laser can destroy.
  • Make your way over lava pits with a mixture of different platforming sections.
  • Solve the puzzles of each room to proceed.
  • Make use of force field glass and player perspective to overcome obstacles.
